name: 咲耶
text:
やあ、プロデューサー
おはよう

name: 咲耶
text:
今日も天気がいいね
とても気持ちのいい朝だ
trans:
Today's weather is good huh. 
It's a perfectly nice morning.

name: プロデューサー
text: そうだな。日差しもあって暖かいし……
trans: Very true. The sunshine sure is pleasant...

I kind of want to
go outside.

It's a good day
for lessons.

text:
日焼けしないように
気をつけよう
trans:
Take care not to
get a sunburn.

name: 咲耶
text:
いい天気にはいい出会いがつきものだからね
いろいろな場所に出向きたくなる気持ちもわかるよ
trans:
That's because good weather is accompanied by 
good encounters. I too understand the desire to 
leave for various places.

name: 咲耶
text: レッスンが終わったら、一緒に散歩でもしないかい？
trans:
Once the lesson is over, shall we go for a stroll 
together?

name: 咲耶
text:
フフ、望むところだよ
体がウズウズするね……
trans:
Heh, I couldn't ask for anything better. 
My body's itching to do something.

name: 咲耶
text:
今日のレッスンは何かな
いつも通り、全力で臨むことにしよう
trans:
What's the lesson today? 
Let's put our all into it as always.

name: 咲耶
text:
確かに紫外線には気をつけないとね
まあ、多少日焼けした姿も健康的でいいと思わないかい？
trans:
I must certainly take care to watch out for UV rays, 
but don't you think a little sunburn is good for your 
figure?

name: 咲耶
text:
……フフ。そんな困った顔をしないでくれ
きちんと紫外線対策はしているよ
trans:
...Hehe. Don't make such a troubled face. I'm taking 
the proper steps to protect myself from the sun.

name: プロデューサー
text: （うっ……しまった。別のことを言えば良かったな……）
trans: (Ah… I should've said something else instead…)
